title: VFX Updates for Amumu, Lulu, Tryndamere and Ziggs
body:
Hello everyone!

Similar to the previous VFX updates we’ve made in the past (*Kennen, Olaf, Wukong, etc*), we're working on updates to the Visual Effects (VFX) of more champions whose spell effects are in need of some love. Our aim is to get their FX to current League standards and improve gameplay clarity. In Patch **9.12**, we'll be releasing VFX updates for **Amumu**, **Lulu**, **Tryndamere** and **Ziggs**.

*Just like the previous ones, and since these are smaller updates geared toward sprucing up some of the oldest members of the roster, they aren't in the same prioritization conversation as to how we decide who gets a VGU (where we take model, gameplay, and thematic into account too!): they do not affect any other timeline, and are more of a side project.*

We're looking for feedback on those changes, which should be up on the PBE now. Please try them out there —especially if you're a main— and leave us your feedback!

-------

>####{{champion:32}} **_~~AMUMU~~_**{{champion:32}} 

*VFX Update aimed at reinforcing his Shuriman thematic and improving his gameplay clarity. Also tried to get as close as possible to his music video’s style.*

https://imgur.com/6jShE38

https://youtu.be/KnNnsP7yY4M

##*Kit:*

* **BA** - New impacts
* **Q** - Added a subtle effect to show the width of the missile. The tip of the missile is now brighter, too.
* **W** - Subtle clarity change, now displaying a reflection. Better representation of the hitbox. Also has a hit effect, now.
* **E** - New AOE, now with sand! Better representation of the hitbox. New and more condensed impact effect.
* **R** - Entirely new AOE effect, now with actual Shuriman runes, sand and flair!
* **P** - Just cleaned up a bit.

## *Skin changes:*

* **All Skins:** Cleaned up to match base.
* **Sad Robot Amumu** received new spell effects across the board.

-------

>######{{champion:117}} **_~~LULU~~_**{{champion:117}} 

*VFX Update aimed at making her magic feel a bit more unique and improving her gameplay clarity.*

https://imgur.com/UNcGkYj

https://youtu.be/jSSG4qwpJ80

##*Kit:*

* **BA** - New missiles and hit effects.
* **Q** - New missiles and cleaned up hit effects.
* **W - Ally** - Improved and cleaned up buff effect.
* **W - Enemy** - Cleaned up missile, with new hit effect.
* **E - Ally** - Improved and cleaned up shield.
* **E - Enemy** - Improved Pix teleport and hit effects.
* **R** - Entirely new AOE effect. Cleaned up enemy hit effect, and new slow effect. Leaves a subtle trail of fairy dust behind.
* **P** - Pix bolts have been cleaned up a bit, while keeping that fairy magic feel.

##*Skin changes:*

* **All Skins:** Cleaned up to match base.
* **Dragon Trainer**: Pix now shoots small pink fireballs.

-------

>#{{champion:23}} **_~~TRYNDAMERE~~_**{{champion:23}} 

*Mostly a clean up to reduce all the noise from his old VFXs, while adding a little bit of Freljord flair.*

https://imgur.com/CV5gSpj

https://youtu.be/dwkjtcMBNEQ

##*Kit:*

* **BA** - New hit effects and adjusted weapon trails.
* **Q** - More visible heal effect with reduced noise.
* **W** - Added a cast effect that shows the range of the ability.
* **E** - New effect, showing the actual width of the AOE (yes, his weapon is bigger than the AOE size).
* **R** - New activation effect and buff.
* **P** - New rage indicator effect.

## *Skin changes:*

* **All Skins:** Cleaned up to match base.
* **Demonblade**: New fiery spell effects.

-------

>##{{champion:115}} **_~~ZIGGS~~_**{{champion:115}} 

*Complete VFX overhaul, focused on showing the actual size of his AOEs and bringing him up to today’s quality standards.*

https://imgur.com/mka8NM7

https://youtu.be/86B2PQFn0PM

##*Kit:*

* **BA** - New missiles and impacts. Sparks!
* **Q** - New missile, but especially new explosion, leaving a crater that shows the AOE size. Sparks too!
* **W** - New explosion, with crater. Has an upward movement to reinforce the knock-up feel. Now has a hit effect. Adjusted AOE indicators to match the hitbox. Also sparks!
* **E** - Added a subtle trail to the missiles. Added a subtle range indicator on the mines. They also leave a small crater on impact. More sparks!
* **R** - New cast, indicators, missile, AOE and hit effect. Finally an actual mushroom cloud! And guess what? Yes, sparks!
* **P** - Empowered hit is more explodey and the missile has more sparks!
* ** Emotes** - Changed the various explosions to look closer to the rest of his kit.

##*Skin changes:*

* **Mad Scientist**: Added bubbles and goo here and there. Green explodey stuff!
* **Pool Party**: Cleaned up the noise and brought him closer to the rest of the skin line.
* **Snow Day**: Cleaned up the noise and added some warmer accents in the missiles and explosions.
* **Arcanist**: Added the crater in the ult and updated the indicator to match base.
* **Odyssey**: Added the crater in the ult.

-------

Please test those changes on the PBE and let us know if you have any feedback!



{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Really nice stuff, especially clarity on Tryndamere's ult.
His winrate will probably go down because of this.

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=cRIFiyaO,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-05-30T05:00:10.583+0000)
>
> His winrate will probably go down because of this.

no... it wont... unless they're blind, deaf and have no sense of time cuz most people know trynd has an r and approximately how long it lasts even if not exactly how long and if your partially blind there is an audio cue. Ziggs on the other hand, slow appearing and also green to instant blue. huge nerf, i dont think they realize how big it is.

I think you're giving the vast majority of this player base too much credit and over estimating how often people even see a Tryndamere. Or were you assuming I'm a dumbass and thought I was talking about him activating his ult? There's an audio que for Trynd **activating** his ult but not for when it ends, knowing when you can finally blow your damage on him is a big question mark for most players and now being able to just see it is a big deal I think.

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=cRIFiyaO,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-30T09:32:11.761+0000)
>
> I think you're giving the vast majority of this player base too much credit and over estimating how often people even see a Tryndamere. Or were you assuming I'm a dumbass and thought I was talking about him activating his ult? There's an audio que for Trynd **activating** his ult but not for when it ends, knowing when you can finally blow your damage on him is a big question mark for most players and now being able to just see it is a big deal I think.

i mean hes fking glowing, at least on demonblade and theres that buff icon but no one looks at that, i guess it will help and mini nerf, i doubt the winrate is gona change and anyways just concerned about the visuals, it looks bad. Just make the old visuals more prominent visually so it helps, dont go thru with the crazy fire and black ice.
Clarity is added but his 1820RP Ultimate skin is still lacking for that tier... I hope they overhaul its visuals

As a dedicated Lulu player, I thank you for updating her VFX, Sirhaian. You did a beautiful job, just as I thought you would. I’ve been a fan of your work even before you worked at Riot.

While I’m here, do you guys have any plans to give Janna or Sona any VFX updates? Their skills look a whole lotta boring and not impactful. It’s one of the reasons why I only use their newer skins pretty much exclusively. 

Additionally, any plans for Lux? At one point, one could argue that were only so many directions one could go with the light element, but we’ve long since been proven differently with Battle Academia (and Prestige, respectively), Lunar Empress, and Elementalist. I’d like to finally fix her hit box problems, as well.
unfortunately, amumu ult looks awful... huge step in the wrong direction
What is it you don't like about it?
personally I'd fill in the empty spots, it looks nice but for gameplays sake it's pretty unclear in the midst of chaos (a little like steel legion lux e)

I can have a look at that. :)
Thanks for the feedback!

> [{quoted}](name=Sirhaian,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=cRIFiyaO,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-29T19:54:56.669+0000)
>
> I can have a look at that. :)
> Thanks for the feedback!

It feels super empty. The current ground pattern is one of my favorite in the game, but this just looks like a circle with triangles on the edges.

> [{quoted}](name=Sirhaian,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=cRIFiyaO,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-29T19:54:56.669+0000)
>
> I can have a look at that. :)
> Thanks for the feedback!

Everything looks great, my only concern is amumu crying being difficult to see compared to current. I'll definitely give it a try and see if it feels that way in game.

It is much easier to see now. :p
But I agree on the above point with the empty spaces. I'll try to fix this up a bit.

If i could offer a suggestion. Use hieroglyphics. maybe a couple of different sections. circle around amumu in middle then a bigger circle with hieroglyphics then another circle section with more hieroglyphics and each section spinning in the opposite direction for the duration. Searching "hieroglyph circle"in google shows the concept. It has gods in some sections and put hieroglyphs in the others almost like the puzzle. Own that shurima lore.

The glyphs used in his ult are Shuriman glyphs. Representing a better Shuriman thematic was one of the goals of this update. Our typical egyptian hieroglyphs are not used in Runeterra (at least, as far as I know) .

I only play Lulu and Ziggs from these 4 so I will speak only for those 2, they are really nice, really, great job, I just think Ziggs ult could use something to make it a bit more.. Flashier ? i think? More color or noise, to make it feels like a big explosion ! Other than that everything is really great in my eyes, great job ! :)

Thanks! Glad you like the changes. :)
As for Ziggs, I went as far as I could with his ult. Any flashier and it might start affecting gameplay. :p

Some thoughts on a breakdown of new ziggs ult, Everything here is incredibly nitpicky and i'll be more than happy to see this on live. But because i really like it and yet it feels off at the same time, i've just spent 10 minutes playing current ziggs ult over and over and comparing it to this new ziggs ult over and over and then i went into pbe to see if the case was different in game because despite loving how it looks it **feels** much less explosive. And indeed it was a case that the videos in isolation made it feel worse than it is.

After playing frame by frame several times and throwing a LOT of ults in practice tool i came to several personal conclusions;

1. The first few frames of explosion are quieter in terms of visuals than live, the effect itself comes off the ground into a sphere and yet it's smaller than the current iteration. Where the ground is replaced by a huge flash of white for a few a frames, if this was changed to allow for visual clarity i understand, but i'd like to see the explosion create a floor of white fire.

2. There is a subtle distortion effect ala Garen ult that ripples outwards in a shockwave effect which shows dissipation of energy into the surrounding area, i'm really happy with that.

3. The sound is far less fiery now, the explosion lacks the same fire crackle and accompanying flames, not sure if this is intended though as it seems there is an overall reduction in the fireball created by the explosion, i assume the direction it was taken in is to be more atomic in nature?

4. The isolated audio of the explosion feels ... Flat(?) As if a cannon ball has landed with a thud and then explodes outward in a flat direction afterwards. This is not the case with current ziggs as the bomb lands and explodes with a more spherical sound which feel like it's going upwards and outwards.

5. The mushroom cloud and fireball are quite small in the newer versions, In terms of art it's great but now the visual effect reaches less height it appears to lack the same energy.

So yeah it's all nitpick stuff and i do believe the vfx update is great but if there was space for anything else to come forward without impacting gameplay. it would help in the ult feeling a little more visceral {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
I really dont like the new ultimate. The new one seems so, i dont know how to describe it, boring? The old one looks bigger, the mushroom bigger, and smokier. It feels way more like a huge Explosion.
Uh, can we not have the big circle persisting around Lulu's Wild Growth target? It evokes the idea that something is happening there (like damage or slow or w/e) and it's not doing anything at all.
Her ult slows all enemy targets around her, which is why there's a persistent AOE effect.
I missed that because the thread said VFX
That's not a new effect, my dude, that's always been there

Ah my mistake. The effect was so negligible that without a VFX I never even realized... Normally I notice these things, so I look pretty silly :P Thanks!

{{sticker:cass-cry}}

Ziggs ult is kinda obnoxious and needs to be toned down, imo

Edit: nevermind my phone screen made it look weird. Good day :)

Love most of the other changes, however.

Neato

The Lulu VFX is really pretty and well done, but there is something I do kinda dislike about it: it's too purple. With her current VFX, her Q&passive are the only abilities that are mainly purple. Her other abilities such as her shield and ulti have pink, yellow and orange mixed in. Obviously purple should be the main-color as that's Lulu's thing, but I think it's currently just too much. To me it would feel more whimsical if more colors were used, I'm especially missing the yellow/orange parts of her abilities.

The VFX is beautifully done, but the colorscheme is kinda giving me cosmic/darkstar-vibes rather than whimisical fairy ones.{{champion:117}}

Hello there @Sirhaian

I'm here to talk about the trynda vfx; 

I generally liked all the stuff you guys made it's all good but the Spin is the big problem here; 

* Why does it need to be such a dark circle in the middle?

As an auto attack champion which only has 125 AA range; We need to be able to see what's around us, And that Dark circle is really not helping May I suggest a bit more transparent filter there cuz it's really dark and hard to see through 

The best example could be the Chemtech Tryndamere, The transparency on that animation is enough for me. Also, the New Demonblade spin looks awesome but could be better with some transparent 


* You only showed the base skin and demonblade but What will happen to fan favorite Sultan skin?

Sultan skin has many tiny details, and animations and also has a different Spin VFX So pls make sure to keep those little details pls pls pls.


* Demonblade still doesn't feel like a Legendary skin :/ feelsbadman :(

At least you get rid of that purple Fury indicator that everyone hated so ty for that but still, it feels like could be better

if I should give an example Nightbringer Yasuo skin has some VFX that is not blocking a lot and still looks fancy. I'm also not saying that demonblade should copy what that skin has but I'm saying that the VFX needs to be a bit more transparent so we can be able to see around ourselves


* And pls let us keep the Spin+Laugh animation cancel ^^

That would be all from me as a person who got more than 1M mastery on the champion and who got all the skins for it I'm really looking forward to this VFX update Ty Riot and Ty to Sirhaian
His music video was my main source of inspiration, yup!

What about Udyr? Is he about to get updated soon or something like that? Champions like Ziggs and Lulu are "getting in front of him" I actually don't know that for sure, Riot can already work on Udyr or have something complete, but still don't know. So what :D? 
- Have a nice day :), sorry i really like dyr :3

I like the Tryndamere changes but could you also try to make all the animations of Tryndameres skins (including base) match the animations of the Sultan skin? Every Tryndamere player will tell you that the auto/crit animations feel a lot smother on the Sultan skin compared to everything else. Would really appreciated it because thats the only thing that prevents me from using a different skin.

Lulu's new effects look really cool and clean

_Now can we please get some visual updates for base lulu, wicked lulu and dragon trainer lulu. And can dragon trainer Lulu get an unique recall, it's a 1350 skin after all_

Ziggs fx look amazing

Mad scientist finally looks how I hoped it would when I bought it on his release :o

{{champion:117}} I don't play Lulu but I love her ult visual effects. So pretty. Might play her. 

{{champion:32}} However I do play Amumu and his ult made me sad instantly when I saw it. Like others have said it looks a little empty. I understand this could be to reduce visual clutter? 
The small glyphs around the edges are probably why. They probably aren't large enough considering how team powerful this ultimate is. E.g. bard with his ult, braum with his ult. Difference is I suppose they're designed to be dodged. 
 
I wonder if it would improve with a champion update overall. I like the idea of the runes appearing first before lighting up/bursting and then his ult occurring. Kind of "un wrapping" or "unravelling" around. Like a blooming lone oasis lotus. Poor Amumu :( 

But my base suggestions are larger glyphs and maybe should keep the coloured circle beneath, even if it's just a faint magic/sand storm haze. As if they got caught in the desert by a lone wandering Amumu and stuck in sandstorm. 

 I think Shurima has poor visual effects compared to Targon, Void and the Cursed Isles which is making it difficult. I remember seeing the colour/effect comparison for themes and do not remember Shurima. Perhaps it isn't really living (undying?) up to its high fantasy Egyptian Empire theme. Then again the only Shurimans I can think of at 5am is Nasus, Renekton, Rammus and Azir and they aren't really well known for their pretty ability magic effects.
When will Lulu Model be updated, tho?

##Amumu

* Awesome overall.
* Amumu loses a *lot* of priority during his Ult and E, possibly making him hard to see during parts of those animations. The ultimate especially makes him look untargetable for a moment.
* Ult fades visually in the center before the root fades, which could be confusing. I might keep it brighter for longer.
* Passive is fairly boring compared to his other effects. Can this get a bit more punch?
* Slight concerned that W doesn't give its range as clearly as it could, and it might be nice to see Tantram have a few more of the burst-style bright effects from his ultimate so they don't come out of the blue there.
* Would be nice if the ult runes came out a little faster so they were clearer for longer.

-----------------------------

##Lulu

* Absolutely glorious.
* Only comment is that I'm not sure the shield even needs the leaves any longer, but that's not a dealbreaker in general.

--------------------------------

##Tryndamere

* Love the new hit effect.
* Green healing lines look weird on a barbarian, but green is consistently healing, so I'll survive.
* The mocking shout looks great, but makes me realize how much I dislike his weird little blade movement (since the effect doesn't deal damage) and the fact that he *does not shout anything*.
* Spin looks *incredible*.
* Ult looks...almost *too* fiery. I miss seeing Tryndamere a bit, and I'm not sure why it has that little burst of frost. I understand he's from Freljord, but it seems a bit arbitrary.
* Concerned there's too much color going on here. We have green, orange, yellow, white, dark red, and dark browns, along with the blue tinges to W and R's burst. I feel reducing this palette might be helpful in making him feel a bit more visually tight.
* "Freljord flair" isn't selling well. Tryndamere -- while he is from the Freljord -- it not especially magical, does not possess ice powers, and is basically just a powerful tribal leader. The ice effects, as a result, feel rather forced and nonsensical, unless you turned that into a common theme and used it on, say, slowed targets, as his healing burst color, etc.

-----------------------------

##Ziggs

* Feels *much* more explosive. Nice job.
* Ziggs ult is nice and satisfying, but I worry the bomb itself isn't as visible as it could be. I feel like if it's going to have that low a visual priority pre-explosion it should have some last-second indicator on the ground marker itself.
Thank you for the constructive feedback! Super appreciate it. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=Sirhaian,realm=NA,application-id=A7LBtoKc,discussion-id=cRIFiyaO,comment-id=002a0000,timestamp=2019-05-29T22:05:02.284+0000)
>
> Thank you for the constructive feedback! Super appreciate it. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Any time! Added a bit to Tryndamere and Amumu I forgot.

Thank *you* for putting in the time to give some attention to these older effects!
Can tryn still laugh during spin? The real question
I'm really happy about the Lulu vfx update! <3 {{champion:117}}
What about Battle Boss Ziggs? Does it also get changed?
Nope, no changes for that skin!

All good but Amumu W, you may want to look at this post 

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/buekc8/as_a_longtime_high_elo_singed_main_he_definitely/epc1anj?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x

Considering the gameplay clarity I think it's even worse than the previous one.

Still, well done, good job and thank you!
I'm changing it up a bit to make it clearer. :)

Apologies if someone else has mentioned it - but with the VFX on Lulu can you update the Winter Wonder Lulu Pix? It uses the old poro model (same with WW Ori's recall) and it always makes me a little sad when I know poros look so much better now.

I love them all, but I wish Pool Party Ziggs' bombs (W, E and especially R) did something instead of creating craters (maybe replace it with waves of water or splashes), because it looks off and kinda ridiculous
